001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004
005@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
006public class Tanh implements ActivationFunction {
007
008    @Override
009    public float activate(float logit) {
010        // tanh(x) = (e^x - e^-x) / (e^x + e^-x)
011        return (float) Math.tanh(logit);
012    }
013
014    @Override
015    public float determineGradientForOutput(float output) {
016        if (!Float.isFinite(output)) {
017            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Output must be a finite number.");
018        }
019        // derivative of tanh(x) with respect to x is 1 - tanh(x)^2
020        return 1.0f - output * output;
021    }
022}
